title: Web Development Practical Competency Strengthening: Just-in-Time Learning Program Using Mobile QR Codes for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: By scanning QR codes, learners can accurately (90%) access timely learning materials for nursing tasks (e.g., patient records, medical information retrieval).
Using QR code-based mobile tools, learners successfully perform real-time communication protocols with peers/doctors at least three times.
Based on structured information from QR codes, learners complete nursing judgment simulations with ≥80% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
